ovdesc.p: AA.ACTIVITY.BALANCES is an intermediate temporary file used to store balance details of all non bill related balance types. This is a live file and updates to this would be controlled by the system as and when accounting updations are needed for non bill related balances.

desc.p: This field stores the Bill reference associated with the activity.
Stores the date time stamp as to when this file was last updated
This field stores the Currency of the Arrangement contract

The property to which the amount has been split. This also contains the actual balance type which was affected by this activity(PROPERTY.BALANCETYPE format). When a single activity settles multiple properties or multiple balances of the same property, this field would be sub-valued to store all details.
This field stores to the Activity Date associated with the activity
This field stores the activity name which has updated a record in this file.
This field stores the unique arrangement activity ID assocaited with the activity.
This field stores the arrangement ID, which is the ID for this file.
The actual amount that was settled for the property and the balance stated in the previous field.
